item.title: Teach kids (7-17) to code with python & CoderDojo
item.description:
Description

For the last 6 years (since pycon 2012) David's had a weekly class teaching kids to code. See what the first steps look like, get involved in a dojo!
item.dc:creator: David Campey

Summary

Changing from .Net to Python: David Campey's talk at PyConZA 2012
